title: Chitosan alchemy: transforming tissue engineering and wound healing
content:

Sheersha Pramanik, Akanksha Aggarwal, Ammar Kadi, Majid Alhomrani, Abdulhakeem S. Alamri, Walaa F. Alsanie, Kanchan Koul, A. Deepak, Stefano Bellucci
Chitosan, a biopolymer acquired from chitin, has emerged as a versatile and favorable material in the domain of tissue engineering and wound healing.
